entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UI tests querying the same thing multiple times #17385
  • Label and ImageButton in Grid - Clicked doesn't fire on Android or iOS, works fine in Windows #17384
  • No Longer Able to Create MapSpan in XAML #17383
  • Binding doesn't update control property after manual update #17382
  • VisualStateManager with TargetName error XFC0001: Cannot resolve property #17380
  • Shell Tabbar Tab Title Selected Text Color & Choppy Animation On Windows #17378
  • BlazorWebView scale is not right for displays with scales greater than 100% #17372
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] SwipeView Execute mode does not work when using Binding Command #17371
    .NET 8 GA
  • Windows: CollectionView is flickering when an item is moved #17369
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Vanilla app crashing on Windows in release mode #17368
  • [WinUI] Cannot invalidate measure and arrange for a ContentView #17367
  • LinearGradient from transparent to white is getting gray at the bottom #17366
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Click events not working in Blazor Hybrid since Preview 7 #17375
    8.0-rc2
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] [WinUI] CollectionView runtime binding errors when loading the ItemSource asynchronously #16787
    .NET 8 GA
  • Better design time error handling on static resources #17377
  • An error was encountered while registering a service worker js script in the MAUI Blazor Hybrid application #17095
  • FlexLayout Memory leak #10904
    Backlog
  • Shell.TitleView taps are not passed in iOS #14931
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] VisualState does not return to `Normal` state when using an `AppThemeBinding` #17354
    .NET 8 GA
  • Setting button IsEnabled to 'true' does not dynamically change background color to match dark/light theme #16538
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] `ArgumentException` on OnPropertyChanged #17357
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe App_Screen reader : Narrator is announcing button but there is no visible control/button present in the screen #15598
    .NET 8 GA
  • .NET MAUI Blazor crash on Windows platform when call Shell.Current.GoToAsync() #8372
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Interface between platforms: UI #17370
  • [iOS] TitleView not working properly #17347
    .NET 8 GA
  • Grid Layout Child Elements Not Taking Full Width of the Screen #17194
  • Editor placed in Grid disappears when size changed #17206
  • OpenAsync with OpenFileRequest opens share window on iphone #17209

PullRequests

Created

  • Split out sharable testing for non-element thing #17387
  • Increase timeouts to 4 hours #17386
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 GA
  • [X] fix CollectionItems enumeration #17364
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • Remove macOS as that is not installed by default #17379
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert changes to setting context and add tests #17348
    .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Port the specificity concept to Bindings #17215
    .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Mac Catalyst Controls Device Tests in CI #17229
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Replace value with same specificity #17365
  • Added integration test for maui blazor maccatalyst codesign verification. #17331
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/testing, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Adjust tap tests so they can work on Windows/iOS #17325
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17362
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Wait for parent to get set before realizing titleview #17360
    .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS InputTransparent layouts and add several InputTransparent UI tests #17286
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #17345
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • [ci] Add MSI transport nugets to sign verify #17335
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Changing value of Shell.NavBarIsVisible should change visibility of toolbar (ShellToolbar) #17358
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixes BindableLayout leaks and EmptyViewTemplate issues #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #17267
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 5 updates #17322
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Remove Previous TitleView from Toolbar #17353
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add basic Android automated accessibility testing #11097
    area/testing, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Consolidate all the test handler construction #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [uitests] Add UITests for RefreshView #16528
    area/testing, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Added Device ID to Essentials.DeviceInfo #16290
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
